1461.question: What neural machine translation models can learn in terms of transfer learning?

4-Figure2-1.png: Neural machine translation models can learn from transfer learning by leveraging pre-trained models that have been trained on a large corpus of data in a source language and then fine-tuned on a smaller corpus of data in the target language.</s>

Neural machine translation models can learn from transfer learning by leveraging pre-trained models that have been trained on a large corpus of data in one language and then fine-tuned on a smaller corpus of data in another language. This allows the model to capture linguistic patterns and relationships that are common across languages, thereby improving its performance on tasks like machine translation.</s>
